review_title: Terrific place to work, but job security only for the happy few
pros: This is a great place for an academic to work. The students are bright and gifted, and the work ethic on campus with both students and profs is amazing.
cons: Income inequality. A (very)  few profs walk around commanding 6 figure salaries and having assistants grade papers while a whole army of lesser fortunate souls vie for tenure or just another year's contract. Their "pay" is supposedly to bask in the glow of U of C prestige.
